snippet: In court, Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair admitted that he had wronged an Army captain with whom he had an adulterous affair for almost three years.
abstract: Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair pleads guilty in military courtroom to array of charges, and military prosecutors agree to drop sexual assault charges that were far more serious; it will be up to judge, Col James L Pohl, to issue a sentence on charges that could carry up to 25 and and a half years in prison.
lead_paragraph: In court, Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair admitted that he had wronged an Army captain with whom he had an adulterous affair for almost three years.

headline.main: Opposing Testimony Caps Trial of General
headline.print_headline: Opposing Testimony Caps Trial of General

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
